story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_01:
Sorry to keep you waiting! How do you like my
sygna suit?
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_02:
It looks great on you, Dawn! And it matches
Cresselia, too!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_03: Yeah, you look super cool—like a hero!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_04: Really? A hero? That IS cool!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_05:
I hope I can be just like all those heroes out there
and help everyone out!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_06: Though, there is more to it than that...
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_07:
Sygna suits help you feel more connected to
your partner Pokémon, don’t they?
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_09: I’ve made a commitment to face Cyrus again.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_11:
Though originally, it started off as a way to help
me forge a stronger bond with Giratina.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_12: When I battled Cyrus...he seemed sad, somehow.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_13:
It’s awful that he abandoned Dialga... But if
there’s any way we can make him understand,
I’m on board!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_14:
Agreed. Cyrus’s goal is to create a complete
world...so eliminating people and Pokémon isn’t
necessarily his true ambition.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_15:
I think there’s a chance that, deep down, he still
has a heart that cares.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_16: And I still believe he can change.
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_18: Professor Sycamore! What happened to you?!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_19:
Be careful... Darkrai’s nightmare...
It’s taken over...
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_26: But wait! If he’s asleep, that’s bad!
story_teamgalactic_02_02000/2401_1201_27: He mentioned Darkrai and nightmares, didn’t he.
